compbody.p: The Underwriters authorise the Coverholder to:

ol.li: bind insurances and make subsequent amendments for the Underwriter's account
issue contract documentation, endorsements or such other documents evidencing insurances and amendments on the Underwriters' behalf
act as the Underwriters’ agent for the purpose of receiving premiums, settling refunds and receiving claims monies
handle claims and/or settle claims on the Underwriters’ behalf
handle complaints and/or settle disputes on the Underwriters’ behalf.

compbody.p: The Coverholder may delegate its authority for each of the following activities to any person, firm or company provided such delegation is under contract and the Underwriters are a party to the contract:

ol.li: bind insurances and make subsequent amendments for the Underwriter's account
issue contract documentation, endorsements or such other documents evidencing insurances and amendments on the Underwriters' behalf
act as the Underwriters’ agent for the purpose of receiving premiums, settling refunds and receiving claims monies
handle claims and/or settle claims on the Underwriters’ behalf
handle complaints and/or settle disputes on the Underwriters’ behalf.

compbody.p: The Coverholder will not delegate its authority for each of the following activities to any person, firm or company:

ol.li: bind insurances and make subsequent amendments for the Underwriter's account
issue contract documentation, endorsements or such other documents evidencing insurances and amendments on the Underwriters' behalf
act as the Underwriters’ agent for the purpose of receiving premiums, settling refunds and receiving claims monies
handle claims and/or settle claims on the Underwriters’ behalf
handle complaints and/or settle disputes on the Underwriters’ behalf.
